categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A young male human serving as an Imperial officer aboard the Executor reported to Admiral Piett when the vessel's shields were compromised, shortly before the vessel's bridge was destroyed by an A-wing piloted by Arvel Crynyd.
This character was portrayed by Alan Flyng, who was also responsible for several of the costumes for the Death Star II crew.
According to the tabulation of Imperial Navy rank plaques seen in The Essential Guide to Warfare, this officer may have held the line rank of either Senior Commander or Senior Captain.
